description.en:
Adds the Modular Cannon, a weapon that can be upgraded by placing upgrade modules behind it.

As far as I am aware, this is the first mod using the v1.0.21.11 mod features. Before this update, this mod would be impossible to make.

Patch notes at https://github.com/Hyperion-21/Modular-Cannon/releases/tag/v1.1.0.

Made by Hyperion_21
